short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share your playing Spotify music or YouTube video details with users on Nerimity!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Nerimity RPC Extension is a sophisticated tool designed to enhance your social experience by enabling you to share your activity with your friends on Nerimity. At present, we offer support for two major platforms: YouTube and Spotify. We are actively working on expanding our support to include additional platforms in the near future.

Our extension provides two distinct methods of connectivity. The first method allows you to connect to the desktop application using a local RPC Websocket server. Alternatively, you can connect using the browser version of Nerimity with the help of this extension.

We are committed to providing a seamless user experience and we value your feedback. If you encounter any issues or if you have suggestions for features, we encourage you to report them on our GitHub Repository. Your input is instrumental in helping us improve our services. Thank you for choosing Nerimity RPC Extension.

Changes:
v0.2.8
Fix Spotify and ignore whitelist from YT Music

v0.2.7
Fix YouTube Music detection

v0.2.6
Fix bugs with YouTube detection

v0.3.0
You can now whitelist YouTube channels
Fixed Spotify repeat
Match progress bar when changing YouTube playback speed

v0.2.2
Fix bugs with pausing media.

v0.2.1
Add 3 dots to overflowing text.

v0.2.0
Add Atomic Radio detection (Thanks deutscher775)
Fixed some bugs.

v0.1.6
Add YT Music detection

v0.1.5
Fixed Spotify detection.

v0.1.4
Update brave warning and made some design changes.

v0.1.3
Fixed a bug where opening a YouTube video in a new tab would cause the RPC to hang.

v0.1.2
We have fixed a bug where disabling activities from the popup would not work.
